author: mzarucki
body:
This is the backport to 10_1_X of the following 10_2_X PR: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23706

Online L1T DQM code which uses the DQM harvester to produce mismatch ratio plots from the summary DQM plots that compare the Muon and CaloLayer2 input collections between all 6 uGT boards. The request is summarised in the following JIRA ticket: https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-329

The relevant DQM plots are produced by the code in the following 10_2_X PR: #23686 (10_1_X backport: #23695). The latter code requires the changes in the L1T unpackers made in the following 10_2_X PR: #23257 (10_1_X backport: #23628). Therefore, both PRs are required for the code to work.
title: Mismatch ratio DQM plots for comparison of Muon and CaloLayer2 input collections between 6 uGT boards
